channel.title: Projects on Luis Boyd Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Luis Boyd Portfolio

item.title: Journey Through The Mountain
item.description: Introduction Journey through the mountain is a game I developed for my 2nd year 2nd semester at staffordshire university. the story behind the development descsion to use Monogame and c# compared to off the shelf game engine such as unity or unreal was I wanted to familurise myself with a typical game loop and game flow. Status The current status of the project is currenty on hold it has a couple of issues still such as the falling mechanic not working quite right and the obvious screen resolution issue, I may re-write the game in a different framework when I revist it.
